articles.title: DOGE is no more, and in its wake, only chaos
articles.description: In April, Elon Musk began backing away from his role as head of DOGE. By June, he was more or less fully gone from DC. In his wake, he left a power vacuum and significant ill will that has apparently led to the dissolution of DOGE eight months before its charter expires.  To call Musk’s […]
articles.author: Terrence O’Brien
